name: Laser Strike (itch)
description:
Lasors and mirrors make up a good team to solve some complicated and fun puzzles. Take your time in the laser lab and arrange them in the right way to hit and break all targets at once.

- 15 brain bending levels for free!

- Like us on facebook and get more free levels!
